title: Geronimo the alpaca killed on orders of Britain's DEFRA after legal battle
content:
1. Geronimo the alpaca killed on orders of Britain's DEFRA after legal battle  The Washington Post
  2. Geronimo the alpaca killed as legal row ends  BBC News
  3. Geronimo the alpaca put down by Defra after being dragged from farm  The Telegraph
  4. Geronimo the alpaca euthanised in Britain despite public outcry  Reuters UK
  5. Geronimo's owner says UK government 'planned to murder' alpaca  Guardian News
